*'${{ needs.prologue.outputs.GIT_PROJECT_NAME }}'* 
 <${{ github.server_url }}/${{ github.repository }}/actions/runs/${{ github.run_id }} | new stack> created by ${{ github.triggering_actor }} 
 <${{ github.server_url }}/${{ github.repository }}/commit/${{ github.event.pull_request.head.sha }} | ${{ needs.prologue.outputs.GIT_SHORT_SHA }}> | ${{ needs.prologue.outputs.GIT_COMMIT_AUTHOR_SUBJECT }}

 <https://${{ env.WP_DOMAIN }}.hooli.workpath.dev|Login Page> | demo+admin1@workpath.com 
 <https://${{ env.WP_DOMAIN }}.connect.workpath.dev|Connect URL>
